con:assertion.name: Http Success Status Code
Verify 50 points for 1st detail line item
Verify 50 points for 2nd detail line item
Http Success Status Code
Verify 100 points for addtional quantity for eligible line item

con:restRequest.name: ReturnTransactionWithTwoEligibleLineItems
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId":"${AddProfile#ProfileId}", "TransactionTypeCode": "RT", "TransactionNetTotal": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionNetTotal}", "ShippingAndHandling": "${PurchaseTransaction#ShippingAndHandling}", "TransactionTotalTax": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionTotalTax}", "TransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_RT", "CurrencyCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#CurrencyCode}", "PostingDateTime": "${PurchaseTransaction#PostingDateTime}", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat(" yyyy - MM - dd 'T' HH: mm: ssZ ").format(new Date()+10000)}", "TransactionDescription": "${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "ProgramCode": "${#Project#ProgramCode}", "GrossAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#GrossAmount}", "TransactionDetails": [{ "TaxAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TaxAmount}", "DollarValueGross": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "DollarValueNet": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ItemNumber": "10100", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "C", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "LineNumber": 1, "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", }, { "TaxAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TaxAmount}", "DollarValueGross": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "DollarValueNet": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ItemNumber": "10101", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "C", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "LineNumber": 2, "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", } ] }

con:assertion.name: Http Success Status Code
Verify -50 points for return line item
Verify 50 points for purchase (original) line item
Http Success Status Code
Verify no points for non- eligible line item
Http Success Status Code
Verify exchange purchase awards 50points for 1st eligible line item
Verify exchange purchase awards 50points for 2st eligible line item
Http Success Status Code

con:restRequest.name: AddExchangeTransaction 2
con:restRequest.con:request: { "ProfileId":"${AddProfile#ProfileId}", "TransactionTypeCode": "EX", "TransactionNetTotal": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ShippingAndHandling": "0", "TransactionTotalTax": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionTotalTax}", "TransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_EX_2", "CurrencyCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#CurrencyCode}", "TransactionDateTime": "${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ").format(new Date())}", "TransactionDescription": "${PurchaseTransaction#TransactionDescription}", "StoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "ProgramCode": "${#Project#ProgramCode}", "GrossAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "TransactionDetails": [ { "TaxAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TaxAmount}", "DollarValueGross": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "DollarValueNet": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ItemNumber": "10102", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "C", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_PR_2", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", "LineNumber": 1, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "RT" }, { "TaxAmount": "-${PurchaseTransaction#TaxAmount}", "DollarValueGross": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "DollarValueNet": "-${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ItemNumber": "10100", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "C", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "LineNumber": 2, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "RT", "OriginalTransactionNumber": "${Generate Guid#result}_PR_2", "OriginalTransactionDateTime": "${Generate Date#result}", "OriginalStoreCode": "${PurchaseTransaction#StoreCode}", }, { "TaxAmount": "${PurchaseTransaction#TaxAmount}", "DollarValueGross": "${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueGross}", "DollarValueNet": "${PurchaseTransaction#DollarValueNet}", "ItemNumber": "10101", "ItemNumberTypeCode": "C", "Quantity": "${PurchaseTransaction#Quantity}", "LineNumber": 3, "ItemTransactionTypeCode": "PR" } ] }

Verify 100 points from original Purchase eligible line item
Verify -100 points from Exchange return eligible line item
